pkgmetadata.longdescription: # higlass-dataPackage that creates data files for CGAP's Higlass browsers## InstallationMake sure `poetry` is installed on your system. Clone the repository and run `poetry install`## Run a script```# -i input file path# -o output file path# -q Shows logs when set to Falsepoetry run create-cohort-vcf -i ./PATH/input.vcf -o ./PATH/input.multires.vcf -q False```
